text: BeautifulSoup.py will need to be placed somewhere on the Python search path, which is available to you in the sys.path array.
Note that the current directory is always included in this array (as the empty string).
For your case, placing the .py file in the same folder will work.
Python modules are top level entities in python programs that can be imported (analogous to C files).
There is a load path which contains a list of directories to search for modules when you're importing them.
I'd recommend that you go through the modules section of the official tutorial for details (and through the whole tutorial as well).
